ComicInfo.Summary:
Where the Emperor is concerned, the legality of a massacre is of little matter, as revolution brews, and Jessica prepares to deliver her child of fate, the discovery of tainted spice cannot go unpunished…
Meanwhile, Shaddam has the perfect subject to frame…
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-01 09:28:54. [CVDB1071746]
ComicInfo.Editor: Bryce Carlson, David Mariotte, Kenzie Rzonca, Maya Bollinger, Shantel LaRocque
ComicInfo.Characters: Anirul Corrino, Bashar Garon, Beast Rabban, C'tair Pilru, Count Hasimir Fenring, Crystane, Dr. Kynes, Duke Leto Atreides, Duncan Idaho, Gurney Halleck, Hidar Fen Ajidica, Lady Jessica, Miral Alechem, Padishah Emperor Shaddam IV, Piter de Vries, Reverend Mother Gaius Helen Mohiam, Rhombur Vernius, Stilgar, Tessia Vernius, Thufir Hawat, Viscount Moritani
ComicInfo.Teams: Bene Gesserit, Bene Tleilax, Fremen, House Atreides, Sardaukar, Spacing Guild
ComicInfo.Locations: Arrakis, Caladan, Castle Caladan, Giedi Prime, Ix, Kaitain
